short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cryptocurrency prices，listed by popular/gainers/losers. Free access to current data for Bitcoin/Ethereum and thousands of coins.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome extension tool developed based on the cryptocurrency Binance exchange. It is mainly aimed at cryptocurrency investors. Investors can check cryptocurrency market conditions, add their favorite currencies, and view the increase and decrease lists in the tool. 

We are passionate about the cryptocurrency industry, we come from technology companies, financial institutions and universities around the world, and we promise that the plugin will be permanently free for cryptocurrency investors to use.

Contact Us:
· Twitter：@binance_tools
· Gitbook：binance-tools.gitbook.io
